text: Kirill Shokurov (; ; born 7 April 1994) is a Belarusian professional footballer who is currently playing for Volna Pinsk.Player's profile at Belshina website ==References== ==External links== * * * Profile at Belshina website Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Belshina Bobruisk players Category:FC Volna Pinsk players Category:FC Khimik Svetlogorsk players
title: Kirill Shokurov
